questions.question: What is the dominant color of the packaging's background?
What is the primary shape of the product's packaging?
What appears to be the material of the product packaging?
What type of information is prominently displayed on the back?
What is the general style of the design elements on the package?
What kind of graphic is featured at the top of the packaging?

Besides nutritional information, what other details are shown?

Does the packaging show any visible seals or tamper evidence?
What is the apparent finish of the packaging surface?
Are there any noticeable creases or folds on the packaging?
What seems to be the approximate size of the package?
What color are the secondary design elements on the bag?
Is the overall design of the packaging minimalistic or elaborate?
